data.name: Outlandia
data.detailed_description:
Outlandia is a western-fantasy, open-world survival RPG!



You are an experienced Outland Ranger - wandering bounty hunters tasked with not just the defense of the common-folk, but actively seeking out bounties against all walks of life, for good or for evil. After a long life of wandering the outland ranges of the world, you look to settle, to grow your own ranch from the ground up, in the booming region of the Isle of Skala. Will you choose the path of the peaceful farmer and leave your past behind, or continue to perform bounty hunting duties - for good, or sometimes for evil. This journey will not just test your morality, but allow you to develop your own world and shape the Skala region around you. With a little innovation and dedication, you might just be able to carve out a little corner of the world for yourself, while also ridding the realm of a growing evil presence.
data.about_the_game:
Outlandia is a western-fantasy, open-world survival RPG!



You are an experienced Outland Ranger - wandering bounty hunters tasked with not just the defense of the common-folk, but actively seeking out bounties against all walks of life, for good or for evil. After a long life of wandering the outland ranges of the world, you look to settle, to grow your own ranch from the ground up, in the booming region of the Isle of Skala. Will you choose the path of the peaceful farmer and leave your past behind, or continue to perform bounty hunting duties - for good, or sometimes for evil. This journey will not just test your morality, but allow you to develop your own world and shape the Skala region around you. With a little innovation and dedication, you might just be able to carve out a little corner of the world for yourself, while also ridding the realm of a growing evil presence.
data.short_description: As a wandering bounty hunter (Outland Ranger), you have garnered skills in survival and combat, but long to have a more peaceful life as a rancher. Will you be able to grow a farm on your own, while also keeping your newfound friends from Skala Village safe from a growing evil presence?

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel(R) Core(TM) i5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 980 Ti
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel(R) Core(TM) i7
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce RTX 2060
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
